Package net.proteusframework.users.prefs

Hibernate backed java.util.prefs implementation that uses the user API for Preferences.userRoot().

Package net.proteusframework.users.prefs Description

Hibernate backed java.util.prefs implementation that uses the user API for Preferences.userRoot().

Example usage for an authenticated user: 
 public Site getSelectedSite()
 {
 Preferences prefs = Preferences.userNodeForPackage(Site.class);
 prefs = prefs.node(Site.class.getSimpleName());
 long siteId = prefs.getLong(SELECTED_SITE_ID, -1);

 SiteManager mgr = DAOContext.SITE_MANAGER.getBean();
 Site site = mgr.getSite(siteId);
 if(site != null) Hibernate.initialize(site);
 return site;
 }

 public void setSelectedSite(Site site)
 {
 long siteId = (site == null ? -1 : site.getId());
 Preferences prefs = Preferences.userNodeForPackage(Site.class);
 prefs = prefs.node(Site.class.getSimpleName());
 prefs.putLong(SELECTED_SITE_ID, Long.valueOf(siteId));

 // NOTE prefs are synchronized at the end of an HTTP request, but you can flush/sync them immediately.
 try
 {
 prefs.flush();
 }
 catch (BackingStoreException e)
 {
 logger.error("Unable to flush prefs.", e);
 }
 }
